translation.features.items.security.title: Privacy & Security
translation.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
translation.faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions below.
translation.faq.q1.question: Is 123LegalDoc a law firm?
translation.faq.q1.answer: No, 123LegalDoc is not a law firm and does not provide legal advice. We provide software and information to help you create your own legal documents. For legal advice, please consult a qualified attorney.
translation.faq.q2.question: Are the documents legally binding?
translation.faq.q2.answer: Our documents are drafted based on common legal requirements. However, laws vary by jurisdiction and specific circumstances. We recommend having any critical document reviewed by an attorney to ensure it meets your specific needs and is enforceable in your jurisdiction.
translation.faq.q3.question: How much does it cost?
translation.faq.q3.answer: We offer a pay-per-document model, typically $5 per document. Some complex documents or bundles may have different pricing. Your first document is often free!
translation.faq.q4.question: Can I edit the documents after generating them?
translation.faq.q4.answer: Yes, you will be able to download your document as a PDF. While the AI helps customize it, final review and minor edits might be possible with PDF editing software, though major changes should ideally be done through our guided process.
translation.faq.q5.question: Is my information secure?
translation.faq.q5.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. We use encryption and industry-standard practices to protect your information. Please see our Privacy Policy for more details.
translation.faq.q6.question: What if I need a document not listed?
translation.faq.q6.answer: You can use our 'General Inquiry' option to describe your needs. Our AI will attempt to guide you or suggest if we can support your request. We are also continuously expanding our library.

translation.home.testimonials.title: Loved by Thousands of Users
translation.home.testimonials.t1.quote: Incredibly easy to use and the AI suggestions were spot on. Saved me hours and a lawyer's fee for my startup agreement!
translation.home.testimonials.t1.name: Sarah L.
translation.home.testimonials.t1.title: Startup Founder
translation.home.testimonials.t2.quote: Needed a rental agreement fast. 123LegalDoc had exactly what I needed, tailored to my state. So much simpler than I expected.
translation.home.testimonials.t2.name: Michael B.
translation.home.testimonials.t2.title: Landlord
translation.home.testimonials.t3.quote: The Spanish language support is fantastic! Made it very easy to create documents for my family and business.
translation.home.testimonials.t3.name: Elena R.
translation.home.testimonials.t3.title: Small Business Owner
translation.home.testimonials.t4.quote: Creating a bill of sale for my car was straightforward. The step-by-step process ensured I didn't miss anything important.
translation.home.testimonials.t4.name: David K.
translation.home.testimonials.t4.title: Private Seller
translation.home.testimonials.t5.quote: The AI helped me understand which document I actually needed. It was like having a helpful guide right there.
translation.home.testimonials.t5.name: Jessica P.
translation.home.testimonials.t5.title: Freelancer
translation.home.testimonials.t5.outcome: Protected my work with the right contract!
